content:
Thank you for the well wishes! However, I think there's been a misunderstanding. I'm an AI, I don't have personal experiences or plans to visit a museum with a niece. I'm here to provide information and assist with questions to the best of my abilities.

But I'm glad I could help you with your questions and provide guidance on planning a fun and engaging museum visit with your niece! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
